name: Sebastian Rosales
title: Full Stack Developer
description: Passionate developer focused on creating innovative solutions with modern technologies.
about: I am a software developer eager to learn and build things that truly make people`s lives easier. I am passionate about technology and always exploring new tools, languages, and methodologies to stay up to date and continue growing professionally. Beyond work, I am passionate about video games, movies, and series, and I enjoy spending time with friends and family while sharing a good mate. I like to combine curiosity and creativity in everything I do, and I am always looking for new ways to learn, experiment, and have fun along the way.
